verses.text: Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I will raise \w up|strong="H5782"\w* against \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and against them that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H3820"\w* of them that rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against me, a \w destroying|strong="H7843"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*;\f + \fr 51.1 \ft midst: Heb. heart\f*

And will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* unto \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \w fanners|strong="H2114"\w*, that shall \w fan|strong="H2219"\w* her, and shall \w empty|strong="H1238"\w* her \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: for in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w trouble|strong="H7451"\w* they shall be against her round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

Against \add him that\add* \w bendeth|strong="H1869"\w* let the \w archer|strong="H1869"\w* \w bend|strong="H1869"\w* his \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, and against \add him that\add* lifteth himself \w up|strong="H5927"\w* in his \w brigandine|strong="H5630"\w*: and \w spare|strong="H2550"\w* ye not her young \w men|strong="H0970"\w*; destroy ye \w utterly|strong="H2763"\w* all her \w host|strong="H6635"\w*.

Thus the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, and \add they that are\add* thrust \w through|strong="H1856"\w* in her \w streets|strong="H2351"\w*.

For \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add hath\add* not \add been\add* \w forsaken|strong="H0488"\w*, nor \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* of his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; though their \w land|strong="H0776"\w* was \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with \w sin|strong="H0817"\w* against the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Flee \w out|strong="H5127"\w* of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and \w deliver|strong="H4422"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: be not cut \w off|strong="H1826"\w* in her \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*; for this \add is\add* the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w*; he will \w render|strong="H7999"\w* unto her a \w recompence|strong="H1576"\w*.

\w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \add hath been\add* a \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, that made all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w drunken|strong="H7937"\w*: the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* have \w drunken|strong="H8354"\w* of her \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*; therefore the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* are \w mad|strong="H1984"\w*.

\w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* is \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* and \w destroyed|strong="H7665"\w*: \w howl|strong="H3213"\w* for her; \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w balm|strong="H6875"\w* for her \w pain|strong="H4341"\w*, if so be she may be \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*.

We would have \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, but she is not \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*: \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* her, and let us \w go|strong="H3212"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* into his own \w country|strong="H0776"\w*: for her \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w reacheth|strong="H5060"\w* unto \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and is lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \add even\add* to the \w skies|strong="H7834"\w*.

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* our \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*: \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and let us \w declare|strong="H5608"\w* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Make \w bright|strong="H1305"\w* the \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w*; \w gather|strong="H4390"\w* the \w shields|strong="H7982"\w*: the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath raised \w up|strong="H5782"\w* the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Medes|strong="H4074"\w*: for his \w device|strong="H4209"\w* \add is\add* against \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, to \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* it; because it \add is\add* the \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, the \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* of his \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*.  +  r 51.11  t bright: Heb. pure *

Set \w up|strong="H5375"\w* the \w standard|strong="H5251"\w* upon the \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, make the \w watch|strong="H4929"\w* \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*, set \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w watchmen|strong="H8104"\w*, \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* the \w ambushes|strong="H0693"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath both \w devised|strong="H2161"\w* and \w done|strong="H6213"\w* that which he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* against the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.\f + \fr 51.12 \ft ambushes: Heb. liers in wait\f*

O thou that \w dwellest|strong="H7931"\w* upon \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w abundant|strong="H7227"\w* in \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*, thine \w end|strong="H7093"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \add and\add* the \w measure|strong="H0520"\w* of thy \w covetousness|strong="H1215"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* hath \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* by \w himself|strong="H5315"\w*, \add saying\add*, Surely I will \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* thee with \w men|strong="H0120"\w*, as with \w caterpillers|strong="H3218"\w*; and they shall lift \w up|strong="H6030"\w* a \w shout|strong="H1959"\w* against thee.\f + \fr 51.14 \ft by himself: Heb. by his soul\f*\f + \fr 51.14 \ft lift up: Heb. utter\f*

He hath \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* by his \w power|strong="H3581"\w*, he hath \w established|strong="H3559"\w* the \w world|strong="H8398"\w* by his \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, and hath stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* by his \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*.

When he \w uttereth|strong="H5414"\w* \add his\add* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \add there is\add* a \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* of \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* in the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*; and he causeth the \w vapours|strong="H5387"\w* to \w ascend|strong="H5927"\w* from the \w ends|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: he \w maketh|strong="H6213"\w* \w lightnings|strong="H1300"\w* with \w rain|strong="H4306"\w*, and bringeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* out of his \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*.\f + \fr 51.16 \ft multitude: or, noise\f*

Every \w man|strong="H0120"\w* is \w brutish|strong="H1197"\w* by \add his\add* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*; every \w founder|strong="H6884"\w* is \w confounded|strong="H3001"\w* by the graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w*: for his molten \w image|strong="H5262"\w* \add is\add* \w falsehood|strong="H8267"\w*, and \add there is\add* no \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* in them.\f + \fr 51.17 \ft is brutish…: or, is more brutish than to know\f*

They \add are\add* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*, the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of \w errors|strong="H8595"\w*: in the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of their \w visitation|strong="H6486"\w* they shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*.

The \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \add is\add* not like them; for he \add is\add* the \w former|strong="H3335"\w* of all things: and \add Israel is\add* the \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* of his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \add is\add* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

Thou \add art\add* my battle \w axe|strong="H4661"\w* \add and\add* \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*: for with thee will I break in \w pieces|strong="H5310"\w* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and with thee will I \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w*;\f + \fr 51.20 \ft with thee: or, in thee, or, by thee\f*

And with thee will I break in \w pieces|strong="H5310"\w* the \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* and his \w rider|strong="H7392"\w*; and with thee will I break in \w pieces|strong="H5310"\w* the \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* and his \w rider|strong="H7392"\w*;

With thee also will I break in \w pieces|strong="H5310"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* and \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*; and with thee will I break in \w pieces|strong="H5310"\w* \w old|strong="H2205"\w* and \w young|strong="H5288"\w*; and with thee will I break in \w pieces|strong="H5310"\w* the young \w man|strong="H0970"\w* and the \w maid|strong="H1330"\w*;

I will also break in \w pieces|strong="H5310"\w* with thee the \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* and his \w flock|strong="H5739"\w*; and with thee will I break in \w pieces|strong="H5310"\w* the \w husbandman|strong="H0406"\w* and his yoke of \w oxen|strong="H6776"\w*; and with thee will I break in \w pieces|strong="H5310"\w* \w captains|strong="H6346"\w* and \w rulers|strong="H5461"\w*.

And I will \w render|strong="H7999"\w* unto \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* and to all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Chaldea|strong="H3778"\w* all their \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* that they have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* in your \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Behold, I \add am\add* against thee, O \w destroying|strong="H4889"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which \w destroyest|strong="H7843"\w* all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: and I will stretch \w out|strong="H5186"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon thee, and roll thee \w down|strong="H1556"\w* from the \w rocks|strong="H5553"\w*, and will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thee a \w burnt|strong="H8316"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*.

And they shall not \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of thee a \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* for a \w corner|strong="H6438"\w*, nor a \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* for \w foundations|strong="H4146"\w*; but thou shalt be \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 51.26 \ft desolate…: Heb. everlasting desolations\f*

Set ye \w up|strong="H5375"\w* a \w standard|strong="H5251"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w blow|strong="H8628"\w* the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w prepare|strong="H6942"\w* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* against her, call \w together|strong="H8085"\w* against her the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of \w Ararat|strong="H0780"\w*, \w Minni|strong="H4508"\w*, and \w Ashchenaz|strong="H0813"\w*; \w appoint|strong="H6485"\w* a \w captain|strong="H2951"\w* against her; cause the \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* to come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* as the \w rough|strong="H5569"\w* \w caterpillers|strong="H3218"\w*.

\w Prepare|strong="H6942"\w* against her the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* with the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Medes|strong="H4074"\w*, the \w captains|strong="H6346"\w* thereof, and all the \w rulers|strong="H5461"\w* thereof, and all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of his \w dominion|strong="H4475"\w*.

And the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w tremble|strong="H7493"\w* and \w sorrow|strong="H2342"\w*: for every \w purpose|strong="H4284"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall be \w performed|strong="H6965"\w* against \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, to \w make|strong="H7760"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* a \w desolation|strong="H8047"\w* without an \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w*.

The mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* have \w forborn|strong="H2308"\w* to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w*, they have \w remained|strong="H3427"\w* in \add their\add* \w holds|strong="H4679"\w*: their \w might|strong="H1369"\w* hath \w failed|strong="H5405"\w*; they became as \w women|strong="H0802"\w*: they have \w burned|strong="H3341"\w* her \w dwellingplaces|strong="H4908"\w*; her \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* are \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*.

One \w post|strong="H7323"\w* shall \w run|strong="H7323"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w another|strong="H7323"\w*, and one \w messenger|strong="H5046"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w another|strong="H5046"\w*, to \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* that his \w city|strong="H5892"\w* is \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* at \add one\add* \w end|strong="H7097"\w*,

And that the \w passages|strong="H4569"\w* are \w stopped|strong="H8610"\w*, and the \w reeds|strong="H0098"\w* they have \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w* are \w affrighted|strong="H0926"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; The \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \add is\add* like a \w threshingfloor|strong="H1637"\w*, \add it is\add* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w thresh|strong="H1869"\w* her: yet a little \w while|strong="H4592"\w*, and the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of her \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.\f + \fr 51.33 \ft it is…: or, in the time that he thresheth her\f*

\w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* hath \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* me, he hath \w crushed|strong="H2000"\w* me, he hath \w made|strong="H3322"\w* me an \w empty|strong="H7385"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*, he hath swallowed me \w up|strong="H1104"\w* like a \w dragon|strong="H8577"\w*, he hath \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* his \w belly|strong="H3770"\w* with my \w delicates|strong="H5730"\w*, he hath cast me \w out|strong="H1740"\w*.

The \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* done to me and to my \w flesh|strong="H7607"\w* \add be\add* upon \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, shall the \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*; and my \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* upon the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Chaldea|strong="H3778"\w*, shall \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*.\f + \fr 51.35 \ft The violence…: Heb. My violence\f*\f + \fr 51.35 \ft flesh: or, remainder\f*\f + \fr 51.35 \ft inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress\f*

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I will \w plead|strong="H7378"\w* thy \w cause|strong="H7379"\w*, and take \w vengeance|strong="H5358"\w* for \w thee|strong="H5360"\w*; and I will dry \w up|strong="H2717"\w* her \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and make her \w springs|strong="H4726"\w* \w dry|strong="H3001"\w*.

And \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* shall become \w heaps|strong="H1530"\w*, a \w dwellingplace|strong="H4583"\w* for \w dragons|strong="H8577"\w*, an \w astonishment|strong="H8047"\w*, and an \w hissing|strong="H8322"\w*, without an \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w*.

They shall \w roar|strong="H7580"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* like \w lions|strong="H3715"\w*: they shall \w yell|strong="H5286"\w* as \w lions’|strong="H0738"\w* \w whelps|strong="H1484"\w*.\f + \fr 51.38 \ft yell: or, shake themselves\f*

In their \w heat|strong="H2527"\w* I will \w make|strong="H7896"\w* their \w feasts|strong="H4960"\w*, and I will make them \w drunken|strong="H7937"\w*, that they may \w rejoice|strong="H5937"\w*, and \w sleep|strong="H3462"\w* a \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*, and not \w wake|strong="H6974"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
I will bring them \w down|strong="H3381"\w* like \w lambs|strong="H3733"\w* to the \w slaughter|strong="H2873"\w*, like \w rams|strong="H0352"\w* with he \w goats|strong="H6260"\w*.

How is \w Sheshach|strong="H8347"\w* \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*! and how is the \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* of the whole \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w surprised|strong="H8610"\w*! how is \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* become an \w astonishment|strong="H8047"\w* among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*!

The \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* is come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* upon \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*: she is \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* with the \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* of the \w waves|strong="H1530"\w* thereof.

Her \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* are a \w desolation|strong="H8047"\w*, a \w dry|strong="H6723"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and a \w wilderness|strong="H6160"\w*, a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* wherein no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w dwelleth|strong="H3427"\w*, neither doth \add any\add* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w thereby|strong="H2004"\w*.

And I will \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* \w Bel|strong="H1078"\w* in \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and I will bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* that which he hath swallowed \w up|strong="H1105"\w*: and the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* shall not flow \w together|strong="H5102"\w* any more unto him: yea, the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*.

My \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, go ye \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of her, and \w deliver|strong="H4422"\w* ye every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* from the \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And lest your \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w faint|strong="H7401"\w*, and ye \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* for the \w rumour|strong="H8052"\w* that shall be \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; a \w rumour|strong="H8052"\w* shall both \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \add one\add* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that in \add another\add* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \add shall come\add* a \w rumour|strong="H8052"\w*, and \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w ruler|strong="H4910"\w* against \w ruler|strong="H4910"\w*.\f + \fr 51.46 \ft lest: or, let not\f*

Therefore, behold, the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, that I will do \w judgment|strong="H6485"\w* upon the graven \w images|strong="H6456"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*: and her whole \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w*, and all her \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of her.\f + \fr 51.47 \ft do…: Heb. visit upon\f*

Then the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and all that \add is\add* therein, shall \w sing|strong="H7442"\w* for \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*: for the \w spoilers|strong="H7703"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto her from the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w As|strong="H1571"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \add hath caused\add* the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, so at \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* of all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 51.49 \ft As…: or, Both Babylon is to fall, O ye slain of Israel, and with Babylon, etc\f*\f + \fr 51.49 \ft the earth: or, the country\f*

Ye that have \w escaped|strong="H6405"\w* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, go \w away|strong="H1980"\w*, stand not \w still|strong="H5975"\w*: \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* afar \w off|strong="H7350"\w*, and let \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* into your \w mind|strong="H3824"\w*.

We are \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w*, because we have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*: \w shame|strong="H3639"\w* hath \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* our \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*: for \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* are \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w sanctuaries|strong="H4720"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

¶ The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* which \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Seraiah|strong="H8304"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Neriah|strong="H5374"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Maaseiah|strong="H4271"\w*, when he \w went|strong="H3212"\w* with \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* into \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* in the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of his \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*.
